message: Hey Bob, I'm selling this product for $180. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay $120. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down to $160, considering the value of this product.  Let's find a middle ground.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm still not able to meet at $160, but I am willing to pay $140 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
